name: Robert Arnold
biography:
Filmmaker's Brief Biography
Born in New Jersey in 1954. Studied sculpture, drawing, and photography before starting to make films in 1980. Earned Ph.D. in
Film Theory , University of Iowa, 1994, and has published articles in leading academic film journals. Has taught film and video since 1985.Currently Associate Professor of Film & Video Studies at
Florida Atlantic University and recently Visiting Professor of Video and Installation at the Academy of Fine Arts in Poznad, Poland.
Resides in Deerfield Beach, Florida, with spouse Katie Travis and
dogs, Mr. Dog and Stinky. Recipient of a 2001 South Florida Cultural Consortium Fellowship for Visual and Media Artists.
